mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.yw_id AS "ywId", a.has_flow_deploy AS "hasFlowDeploy", a.flow_deploy_way AS "flowDeployWay", a.flow_gd AS "flowGd", a.flow_xml AS "flowXml", a.has_score AS "hasScore", a.score_fid AS "scoreFid", a.has_menu AS "hasMenu", a.menu_reset AS "menuReset", a.menu_theme AS "menuTheme", a.has_global_audit AS "hasGlobalAudit", a.audit_type AS "auditType", a.audit_office_id AS "auditOfficeId", a.has_categpry AS "hasCategpry", a.categpry_reset AS "categpryReset", a.categpry_theme AS "categpryTheme", a.has_notice AS "hasNotice", a.has_msg AS "hasMsg", a.has_email AS "hasEmail", a.has_cert AS "hasCert", a.cert_way AS "certWay", a.cert_show_type AS "certShowType", a.cert_notice AS "certNotice", a.cert_msg AS "certMsg", a.cert_email AS "certEmail", a.has_assign AS "hasAssign", a.assign_way AS "assignWay", a.assign_show_type AS "assignShowType", a.has_time AS "hasTime", a.has_apypage AS "hasApypage", a.apypage_as_start AS "apypageAsStart", a.apypage_id AS "apypageId", a.apypage_url AS "apypageUrl", a.has_applylt AS "hasApplylt", a.applylt_way AS "applyltWay", a.applylt_num AS "applyltNum", a.has_prate AS "hasPrate", a.prate_way AS "prateWay", a.prate_show_type AS "prateShowType", a.has_nrule AS "hasNrule", a.nrule_id AS "nruleId", a.has_rename AS "hasRename", a.rename_way AS "renameWay", a.has_axis AS "hasAxis", a.has_key AS "hasKey", a.key_type AS "keyType", a.has_teamlt AS "hasTeamlt", a.teamlt_min AS "teamltMin", a.teamlt_max AS "teamltMax", a.allow_enjoy AS "allowEnjoy", a.has_incubator AS "hasIncubator", a.incubator_fid AS "incubatorFid", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o14 ON o14.id = a.audit_office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_yw_config( id, yw_id, has_flow_deploy, flow_deploy_way, flow_gd, flow_xml, has_score, score_fid, has_menu, menu_reset, menu_theme, has_global_audit, audit_type, audit_office_id, has_categpry, categpry_reset, categpry_theme, has_notice, has_msg, has_email, has_cert, cert_way, cert_show_type, cert_notice, cert_msg, cert_email, has_assign, assign_way, assign_show_type, has_time, has_apypage, apypage_as_start, apypage_id, apypage_url, has_applylt, applylt_way, applylt_num, has_prate, prate_way, prate_show_type, has_nrule, nrule_id, has_rename, rename_way, has_axis, has_key, key_type, has_teamlt, teamlt_min, teamlt_max, allow_enjoy, has_incubator, incubator_fid, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ywId}, #{hasFlowDeploy}, #{flowDeployWay}, #{flowGd}, #{flowXml}, #{hasScore}, #{scoreFid}, #{hasMenu}, #{menuReset}, #{menuTheme}, #{hasGlobalAudit}, #{auditType}, #{auditOfficeId}, #{hasCategpry}, #{categpryReset}, #{categpryTheme}, #{hasNotice}, #{hasMsg}, #{hasEmail}, #{hasCert}, #{certWay}, #{certShowType}, #{certNotice}, #{certMsg}, #{certEmail}, #{hasAssign}, #{assignWay}, #{assignShowType}, #{hasTime}, #{hasApypage}, #{apypageAsStart}, #{apypageId}, #{apypageUrl}, #{hasApplylt}, #{applyltWay}, #{applyltNum}, #{hasPrate}, #{prateWay}, #{prateShowType}, #{hasNrule}, #{nruleId}, #{hasRename}, #{renameWay}, #{hasAxis}, #{hasKey}, #{keyType}, #{hasTeamlt}, #{teamltMin}, #{teamltMax}, #{allowEnjoy}, #{hasIncubator}, #{incubatorFid}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_yw_config SET yw_id = #{ywId}, has_flow_deploy = #{hasFlowDeploy}, flow_deploy_way = #{flowDeployWay}, flow_gd = #{flowGd}, flow_xml = #{flowXml}, has_score = #{hasScore}, score_fid = #{scoreFid}, has_menu = #{hasMenu}, menu_reset = #{menuReset}, menu_theme = #{menuTheme}, has_global_audit = #{hasGlobalAudit}, audit_type = #{auditType}, audit_office_id = #{auditOfficeId}, has_categpry = #{hasCategpry}, categpry_reset = #{categpryReset}, categpry_theme = #{categpryTheme}, has_notice = #{hasNotice}, has_msg = #{hasMsg}, has_email = #{hasEmail}, has_cert = #{hasCert}, cert_way = #{certWay}, cert_show_type = #{certShowType}, cert_notice = #{certNotice}, cert_msg = #{certMsg}, cert_email = #{certEmail}, has_assign = #{hasAssign}, assign_way = #{assignWay}, assign_show_type = #{assignShowType}, has_time = #{hasTime}, has_apypage = #{hasApypage}, apypage_as_start = #{apypageAsStart}, apypage_id = #{apypageId}, apypage_url = #{apypageUrl}, has_applylt = #{hasApplylt}, applylt_way = #{applyltWay}, applylt_num = #{applyltNum}, has_prate = #{hasPrate}, prate_way = #{prateWay}, prate_show_type = #{prateShowType}, has_nrule = #{hasNrule}, nrule_id = #{nruleId}, has_rename = #{hasRename}, rename_way = #{renameWay}, has_axis = #{hasAxis}, has_key = #{hasKey}, key_type = #{keyType}, has_teamlt = #{hasTeamlt}, teamlt_min = #{teamltMin}, teamlt_max = #{teamltMax}, allow_enjoy = #{allowEnjoy}, has_incubator = #{hasIncubator}, incubator_fid = #{incubatorFid}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
